content:
PSA: cov-marks now work fine across crates: https://github.com/rust-analyzer/rust-analyzer/pull/9238

If you remember removing a mark when moving code/tests into a different crate, you can now reverse it! (I'll try to pickaxe through git history as well)
0 days since @nagisa realizes they aren't subscribed to any activity events for a crate they co-maintain.
@nagisa (and anyone, really) note that I published only a -pre version, so feel free to chime in with suggestions before its too late :D
